llm_res.rule: Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.
Callers MUST handle false from returns (bool success). Callers MUST NOT assume that false is never returned!
The balanceOf function should return the exact balance of the account.
The function `decimals` should return the number of decimals the token uses - e.g. 8, means to divide the token amount by 100000000 to get its user representation.
